description: Spec quality checklist — 'unit tests for English' (adapted from GitHub spec-kit, ADR D156)

required_sections.name: Feature Description
required_sections.description: Clear description of what the feature does and why

required_sections.name: User Story
required_sections.description: Standard user story format: As a <role> I want <goal> So that <benefit>

required_sections.name: Solution Statement
required_sections.description: How the feature will be implemented at a high level

required_sections.name: ATO Impact Assessment
required_sections.description: Boundary impact tier (GREEN/YELLOW/ORANGE/RED), NIST controls, SSP impact

required_sections.name: Acceptance Criteria
required_sections.description: Testable success criteria — at least 3 items

required_sections.name: Testing Strategy
required_sections.description: Unit, BDD, edge case, and E2E testing approach

required_sections.name: Validation Commands
required_sections.description: Bash commands to verify the implementation

quality_rules.name: No ambiguous phrases
quality_rules.description: Spec should not contain vague terms like 'timely', 'appropriate', 'as needed'

quality_rules.name: Acceptance criteria are testable
quality_rules.description: Each acceptance criterion must contain a measurable or observable assertion

quality_rules.name: Min 3 acceptance criteria
quality_rules.description: Specifications must have at least 3 acceptance criteria

quality_rules.name: ATO boundary tier specified
quality_rules.description: ATO Impact Assessment must specify a boundary impact tier

quality_rules.name: NIST controls listed
quality_rules.description: At least one NIST 800-53 control ID should be referenced

quality_rules.name: Testing strategy present
quality_rules.description: Testing Strategy section must exist with content

quality_rules.name: Validation commands present
quality_rules.description: Validation Commands section should include executable commands

quality_rules.name: Tasks cover all phases
quality_rules.description: Each Implementation Plan phase should have corresponding Step by Step Tasks

quality_rules.name: Constitution compliance
quality_rules.description: Spec must not violate project constitution principles
